text:
Message 2208 of 4024
Hi Robert,
Your lawyer requested we respond to the parenting plans in a week, which we will do.
We clearly have a different view on what is in best interest of the children considering the totality of what transpired and what it looks like to keep
them safe and address their overall emotional, mental and physical well being moving forward.
I am on OFW. After the abuse of the OFW call to tell me you were worried about my mental state, I can’t trust you will use it in the way it was
intended.
Christine
Sent:03/18/2024 at 12:45 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/18/2024 at 12:46 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication as Healthy Coparents
Message 2209 of 4024
That’s not what I asked you. Please review.
I am trying to work constructively with you. We had a super call this weekend and made everything right in two minutes. I even acknowledged the
miscue we had. We were good and sorted almost immediately. Please reconsider what was demonstrated to work and stop the black out in the best
interest of Max and Adrian.
Sent:03/18/2024 at 12:50 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/18/2024 at 03:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication as Healthy Coparents
Message 2210 of 4024
So... you keep meticulous track of what does not work to reinforce your POV. May I please ask for the same accounting to be applied to both of our
last interactions? They work. I don’t push, I own when I misstep. And it’s done.
It also reminds me of our SAAS admissions week. Six huge agreements in four days because we communicated together to act as healthy co parents.
Let’s be bold and take a chance to build on those two wins when we communicate.
Please consider success as a decision making metric.
Sent:03/18/2024 at 01:06 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/18/2024 at 03:10 PM)
Subject:Re: Communication as Healthy Coparents
Message 2211 of 4024
We were able to get some incredible things done over the last few days through short phone calls and team meetings. We got sass and five other things
Sent:03/18/2024 at 08:55 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/19/2024 at 07:04 AM)
Subject:Mission accomplished- you killed itT
